sources.title: "Conductor 1492" (1924)
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems "Conductor 1492" is a comedy directed by Frank Griffin and Charles Hines featuring Johnny Hines, Doris May, Dan Mason, Ruth Renick, Robert Cain, Fred Esmelton, Byron Sage, Michael Dark, Dorothy Vernon and others. A young immigrant working as a streetcar conductor has a chance to save the company from crooks and win the president's daughter.
